title: Ekushey Book Fair
description: The Ekushey Book Fair, also known as Amar Ekushey Boi Mela, is an iconic celebration of Bengali literature. It pays tribute to the Language Movement martyrs.

title: Pohela Boishakh Parade
description: Pohela Boishakh marks the Bengali New Year, celebrated with colorful parades, traditional music, dance, and delicious food. It symbolizes unity and cultural heritage.

title: Eid Celebration
description: Eid-ul-Fitr is a significant Muslim festival marking the end of Ramadan. It's celebrated with prayers, feasts, and cultural gatherings.

title: Durga Puja Festival
description: Durga Puja is a major Hindu festival celebrated with grand processions, idol immersion, and cultural performances. It honors the goddess Durga.

title: Bijoy Dibosh (Victory Day)
description: Victory Day commemorates the victory of Bangladesh in the 1971 Liberation War. It includes a grand military parade and cultural events.

title: Nobanno Utsab (Harvest Festival)
description: Nobanno Utsab celebrates the harvest season with traditional rituals, folk music, dance, and feasting. It reflects rural Bengali culture.

title: Bengali Film Festival
description: The Bengali Film Festival showcases the best of Bengali cinema with film screenings, discussions, and awards. It's a treat for movie enthusiasts.

title: Dhaka International Folk Festival
description: The Dhaka International Folk Festival features performances by folk artists from around the world, celebrating the diversity of folk music.

title: Pitha Utsav (Traditional Cake Festival)
description: Pitha Utsav is a festival dedicated to traditional Bengali rice cakes known as PITHA. It features the preparation and sharing of various pitha.
